name: Christmas Crunch
description:
Christmas crunch is a one-button game where you play as overworked elves in Santa's gifts factory. 

Throw the gifts from elf to elf and load them as fast as possible on the sleigh to respect the tight time schedule and avoid Santa's Wrath.

This game was made in 1 day and 8 hours for the Aurora Punks Winter Game Jam 2021

Credits

- Game Design, Programming: Enrico Consiglio

- Art: Victoria Gellin

-Music, SFX: Nicke Lundqvist
